casebody.data:
State
v.
Derrick D. Boger 158P06-8 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Derrick D. Boger, For Boger, Derrick D. Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, For State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of April 2016 by Defendant to Appeal An Consolidation of Sentences:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
